event.name: MonitorInfo
event.summary: Records a unique external monitor information, only once when it's plugged in by a user for the very first time on that device.

metric.name: DisplayName
metric.summary: The Name of the Monitor.

metric.name: ManufacturerId
metric.summary: ID of the monitor's manufacturer.

metric.name: ProductId
metric.summary: Monitor's Product ID.

metric.name: NativeModeSize
metric.summary: The Monitor's Native Mode Size.

metric.name: NativeModeRefreshRate
metric.summary: The Monitor's Native Mode Refresh Rate.

metric.name: PhysicalSize
metric.summary: The Physical Size of the Monitor in inches.

metric.name: ConnectionType
metric.summary: The Connection type used to connect the display into the chromebook.

metric.name: IsVrrCapable
metric.summary: The Monitor's Ability to support Variable Refresh Rate.

project.name: FastPair
project.summary: Metrics for the ChromeOS Fast Pair implementation.

event.name: DiscoveryNotificationShown
event.summary: The user is shown a notification which can start the pairing process.

metric.name: Protocol
metric.summary: The pairing protocol of the discovered device.

metric.name: FastPairVersion
metric.summary: The Fast Pair spec version the device implements.

metric.name: ModelId
metric.summary: The model ID of the discovered device.

metric.name: RSSI
metric.summary: The inquiry RSSI of the discovered device, recorded at the time of metrics emission, with a range of -128 to 127. If inquiry RSSI is unknown, we report -129.

metric.name: TxPower
metric.summary: The inquiry TxPower of the discovered device, recorded at the time of metrics emission, with a range of -128 to 127. If inquiry TxPower is unknown, we report -129.

event.name: PairingStart
event.summary: The starting of the pairing process.

metric.name: Protocol
metric.summary: The pairing protocol being started.

metric.name: FastPairVersion
metric.summary: The Fast Pair spec version the device implements.

metric.name: ModelId
metric.summary: The model ID of the device being paired.

metric.name: RSSI
metric.summary: The inquiry RSSI of the pairing device, recorded at the time of metrics emission, with a range of -128 to 127. If inquiry RSSI is unknown, we report -129.

metric.name: TxPower
metric.summary: The inquiry TxPower of the pairing device, recorded at the time of metrics emission, with a range of -128 to 127. If inquiry TxPower is unknown, we report -129.

event.name: PairingComplete
event.summary: The end of the pairing process.

metric.name: Protocol
metric.summary: The pairing protocol being started.

metric.name: FastPairVersion
metric.summary: The Fast Pair spec version the device implements.

metric.name: ModelId
metric.summary: The model ID of the device being paired.

metric.name: RSSI
metric.summary: The inquiry RSSI of the paired device, recorded at the time of metrics emission, with a range of -128 to 127. If inquiry RSSI is unknown, we report -129.

metric.name: TxPower
metric.summary: The inquiry TxPower of the paired device, recorded at the time of metrics emission, with a range of -128 to 127. If inquiry TxPower is unknown, we report -129.

event.name: PairFailure
event.summary: The pairing process failed for the provided reason.

metric.name: Protocol
metric.summary: The pairing protocol being started.

metric.name: FastPairVersion
metric.summary: The Fast Pair spec version the device implements.

metric.name: Reason
metric.summary: The pairing failure reason.

metric.name: ModelId
metric.summary: The model ID of the device being paired.

event.name: CrOSActionEvent.FileOpened
event.summary: Records whenever a file is opened in the File App on ChromeOS.

metric.name: Filename
metric.summary: The absolute path of the file.

metric.name: OpenType
metric.summary: The type of file open, defined in FileTaskObserver::OpenType.

metric.name: SequenceId
metric.summary: Sequence of this action across all CrOSActionEvent.

metric.name: TimeSinceLastAction
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since last CrOSActionLogging.

event.name: CrOSActionEvent.SearchResultLaunched
event.summary: Records information about the launch of an item from ChromeOS launcher.

metric.name: Query
metric.summary: The search query associated with this launch.

metric.name: ResultType
metric.summary: Which type of search provider the launched result was created by.

metric.name: SearchResultId
metric.summary: The ID of the launched result result. For example, the app ID for app results, or the URL for omnibox results.

metric.name: SequenceId
metric.summary: Sequence of this action across all CrOSActionEvent.

metric.name: TimeSinceLastAction
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since last CrOSActionLogging.

event.name: CrOSActionEvent.SettingChanged
event.summary: Records when a setting is changed; only records quick settings for now.

metric.name: CurrentValue
metric.summary: Value of the setting after the change.

metric.name: PreviousValue
metric.summary: Value of the setting before the change.

metric.name: SequenceId
metric.summary: Sequence of this action across all CrOSActionEvent.

metric.name: SettingId
metric.summary: The setting id (in ash::ml::UserSettingsEvent::Event::SettingId) that represents the type of the changed setting.

metric.name: SettingType
metric.summary: Enum that represents where the settings event originated from (in ash::ml::UserSettingsEvent::Event::SettingType).

metric.name: TimeSinceLastAction
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since last CrOSActionLogging.

event.name: CrOSActionEvent.TabEvent.TabNavigated
event.summary: Records a tab activity of navigating to a new url.

metric.name: PageTransition
metric.summary: The types of transition between pages. See more on ui::PageTransition.

metric.name: SequenceId
metric.summary: Sequence of this action across all CrOSActionEvent.

metric.name: TimeSinceLastAction
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since last CrOSActionLogging.

metric.name: URL
metric.summary: The URL of the current event.

metric.name: Visibility
metric.summary: The visibility of this url, see more on content::Visibility.

event.name: CrOSActionEvent.TabEvent.TabOpened
event.summary: Records a tab activity of opening a new url with ctrl+click.

metric.name: SequenceId
metric.summary: Sequence of this action across all CrOSActionEvent.

metric.name: TimeSinceLastAction
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since last CrOSActionLogging.

metric.name: URL
metric.summary: The URL of the current event.

metric.name: URLOpened
metric.summary: The URL that is opened from the current url.

metric.name: WindowOpenDisposition
metric.summary: Enum that indicates where the new tab is opened, see more on WindowOpenDisposition.

event.name: CrOSActionEvent.TabEvent.TabReactivated
event.summary: Records a tab activity of reactivating an existing tab.

metric.name: SequenceId
metric.summary: Sequence of this action across all CrOSActionEvent.

metric.name: TimeSinceLastAction
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since last CrOSActionLogging.

metric.name: URL
metric.summary: The URL of the current event.

event.name: LauncherUsage
event.summary: Records information about the launch of an item (such as an app or a file) from the ChromeOS launcher. One event is recorded for every launch originating from any launcher UI component, and this is the only circumstance that records events.

metric.name: App
metric.summary: App ID of the most-recently-opened app when this launch occurred. This can be an app ID of a Chrome app, Arc++ app, or PWA.

metric.name: Domain
metric.summary: The most-recently-visited domain when this launch occurred.

metric.name: Hour
metric.summary: The hour of launch. This is the user's local time rounded to the nearest hour, 0 to 23 inclusive.

metric.name: ProviderType
metric.summary: Which type of search provider the launched result was created by. This comes from the AppListSearchResultType enum.

metric.name: Score
metric.summary: The relevance score of the launched result. This is a double multiplied by 1000 and cast to an int64. Results that don't have a score report 0.

metric.name: SearchQuery
metric.summary: The search query associated with this launch. Before hashing, the query is the empty string if there was no search query.

metric.name: SearchQueryLength
metric.summary: String length of the search query associated with this launch. If there was no query, this is zero.

metric.name: Target
metric.summary: The target item of this launch, eg. an app ID, filepath, or omnibox URL.

project.name: NearbyShare
project.summary: Metrics for the ChromeOS Nearby Share implementation.

event.name: Discovery
event.summary: A share target has been discovered by a sender.

metric.name: Platform
metric.summary: The platform of the discovered share target.

metric.name: DeviceRelationship
metric.summary: The relationship type of the discovered share target.

metric.name: TimeToDiscovery
metric.summary: The time in milliseconds it took to discovery this share target from the start of the discovery process.

event.name: Throughput
event.summary: A snapshot of the transfer rate of an in progress transfer.

metric.name: IsReceiving
metric.summary: A boolean value describing if this devices is receiving this transfer. If false, it is assumed to be the sender.

metric.name: Platform
metric.summary: The platform of the share target used for this transfer.

metric.name: DeviceRelationship
metric.summary: The relationship type of the share target used for this transfer.

metric.name: Medium
metric.summary: The medium used during this segment of the transfer.

metric.name: UpdateBytes
metric.summary: The number of bytes transferred during this segment of the transfer.

metric.name: UpdateMillis
metric.summary: The duration in milliseconds of this segment of the transfer.

metric.name: TransferredBytes
metric.summary: The number of bytes transferred so far.

metric.name: TotalTransferBytes
metric.summary: The total size in bytes for this transfer.

event.name: FileAttachment
event.summary: A file attachment transferred over Nearby Share.

metric.name: IsReceiving
metric.summary: A boolean value describing if this devices is receiving this transfer. If false, it is assumed to be the sender.

metric.name: Platform
metric.summary: The platform of the share target used for this attachment.

metric.name: DeviceRelationship
metric.summary: The relationship type of the share target used for this attachment.

metric.name: FileType
metric.summary: The file type of this attachment.

metric.name: Size
metric.summary: The size in bytes for attachment.

metric.name: Result
metric.summary: The end result of the transfer for this attachment.

event.name: TextAttachment
event.summary: A text attachment transferred over Nearby Share.

metric.name: IsReceiving
metric.summary: A boolean value describing if this devices is receiving this transfer. If false, it is assumed to be the sender.

metric.name: Platform
metric.summary: The platform of the share target used for this attachment.

metric.name: DeviceRelationship
metric.summary: The relationship type of the share target used for this attachment.

metric.name: TextType
metric.summary: The text type of this attachment.

metric.name: Size
metric.summary: The size in bytes for attachment.

metric.name: Result
metric.summary: The end result of the transfer for this attachment.

event.name: ShareSession
event.summary: A Nearby Share session. This is emitted when the session completes, regardless of whether or not the transfer was successful.

metric.name: IsReceiving
metric.summary: A boolean value describing if this devices is receiving this transfer. If false, it is assumed to be the sender.

metric.name: Platform
metric.summary: The platform of the share target used for this attachment.

metric.name: DeviceRelationship
metric.summary: The relationship type of the share target used for this attachment.

metric.name: TimeToDiscovery
metric.summary: The time in milliseconds it took to discovery this share target from the start of the discovery process.

metric.name: TimeToSelect
metric.summary: The time in milliseconds it took to select this share target from the time the target was discovered. This is only emitted for the sending flow.

metric.name: TimeToConnect
metric.summary: The time in milliseconds it took to connect to this share target from the time the target was discovered. This is only emitted for the sending flow. This will not be set for targets that fail to connect.

metric.name: TimeToAccept
metric.summary: The time in milliseconds it took the receiver to accept or reject the transfer from the time the target was discovered. Receivers begin the Nearby Share flow at discovery. This will not be set for a sender that fails to connect. It will always be set for receivers.

metric.name: TimeToTransferComplete
metric.summary: The time in milliseconds it took the transfer to complete from the time the target was discovered.

metric.name: InitialMedium
metric.summary: The initial medium used for this transfer.

metric.name: TimeToUpgrade
metric.summary: The time in milliseconds it took the connection to upgrade the transfer medium from the time the target was discovered. This will only be set if an upgrade occurred.

metric.name: FinalMedium
metric.summary: The final medium used for this transfer. This changes when there is a bandwidth upgrade.

metric.name: NumberOfFiles
metric.summary: The number of file attachments for this transfer.

metric.name: NumberOfTexts
metric.summary: The number of text attachments for this transfer.

metric.name: NumberOfWiFiCredentials
metric.summary: The number of WiFi credentials attachments for this transfer.

metric.name: TotalTransferBytes
metric.summary: The total size in bytes of all attachments for this transfer.

metric.name: BytesTransferred
metric.summary: The number of bytes send or received during this transfer. This will be different than the total transfer size when the transfer fails or is cancelled.

metric.name: Result
metric.summary: The end result of the transfer for this attachment.

project.name: StructuredMetrics
project.summary: Structured Metrics is a logging framework for events. This project is used for monitoring the framework itself.

event.name: Initialization
event.summary: Records metadata about initialization of Structured Metrics and will be recorded immediately after initialization is successful. Will be sent once per initialization during browser process initialization.

metric.name: Platform
metric.summary: The platform for which the client is initialized on. 0: Uninitialized, 1: ASH_CHROME, 2: LACROS_CHROME.

project.name: CrOSEvents
project.summary: Project used to record a sequence of events that are related to each other.

event.name: AppDiscovery.AppInstalled
event.summary: Recorded whenever a new app is installed on Chrome OS.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: Key that identifies an app.

metric.name: AppType
metric.summary: The type of app that was installed (ie ARC, native, Crostini, etc.).

metric.name: InstallSource
metric.summary: Origin from which the app was installed (ie launcher, playstore).

metric.name: InstallReason
metric.summary: Reason for which the app was installed.

event.name: AppDiscovery.AppLaunched
event.summary: Recorded whenever a new app is launched on Chrome OS.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: Key that identifies an app.

metric.name: AppType
metric.summary: The type of app that was installed (ie ARC, native, Crostini, etc.).

metric.name: LaunchSource
metric.summary: From where the app was launched from (ie launcher, shelf).

event.name: AppDiscovery.AppUninstall
event.summary: Recorded whenever an app is uninstalled on Chrome OS.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: Key that identifies an app.

metric.name: AppType
metric.summary: The type of app that was installed (ie ARC, native, Crostini, etc.).

metric.name: UninstallSource
metric.summary: From where the app was uninstalled.

event.name: AppDiscovery.AppStateChanged
event.summary: Recorded when a change in an app state has been detected.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: Key that identifies an app.

metric.name: AppState
metric.summary: Denotes a change in an app state. 0 - INACTIVE, 1 - ACTIVE, 2 - CLOSED.

event.name: AppDiscovery.LauncherOpen
event.summary: Event collected if the launcher is opened. This is recorded when a zero- state query is initiated.

event.name: AppDiscovery.AppLauncherResultOpened
event.summary: Event collected if a result iis opened in the launcher.

metric.name: FuzzyStringMatch
metric.summary: Score that represents how close the initial query was to the app result selected. A score of 1.0 represents an exact match.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: App ID that identifies an app on the client. This will only be recorded if the user has consented into app-sync.

metric.name: AppName
metric.summary: Name of the app that was launched. Names are UTF-16 string encoding.

metric.name: ResultCategory
metric.summary: Enum representing the category of app the result is. This enum should map to ash::SearchResultType.

event.name: AppDiscovery.Browser.OmniboxInstallIconClicked
event.summary: Event recorded when the PWA Install Icon is clicked.

metric.name: IPHShown
metric.summary: Boolean if the IPH (In-product help) was shown when the icon was clicked. 1 if the IPH was shown 0 otherwise.

event.name: AppDiscovery.Browser.AppInstallDialogShown
event.summary: Event recorded when the PWA confirmation dialog is shown.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: Identifier of the app for which the bubble view is shown.

event.name: AppDiscovery.Browser.AppInstallDialogResult
event.summary: Event capturing the result of the app install dialog shown in the browser. This event will be captured if the install is accepted or cancelled. If a user switches to a different tab, this will result in a "cancel".

metric.name: WebAppInstallStatus
metric.summary: 1 if accepted. 0 if cancelled. The status is considered cancelled if the bubble dialog is closed before an "Accept" status has been detected.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: Identifier of the app for which the bubble view is shown.

event.name: AppDiscovery.Browser.ClickInstallAppFromMenu
event.summary: Event recorded when a PWA is installed from the browser menu.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: Identifier of the app that is being installed.

event.name: AppDiscovery.Browser.CreateShortcut
event.summary: Event recorded when a web app or PWA is installed by creating a shortcut.

metric.name: AppId
metric.summary: Identifier of the app that is being installed.

event.name: CameraApp.StartSession
event.summary: Event recorded when the camera app is started.

metric.name: LaunchType
metric.summary: The type indicates how the camera app is launched.

metric.name: Language
metric.summary: The integer maps to the LocaleCodeISO639 enum indicating the language that CCA UI uses.

event.name: CameraApp.Capture
event.summary: Event recorded when the camera app executes a capture.

metric.name: Mode
metric.summary: The mode where the capture happens.

metric.name: Facing
metric.summary: The facing of the capturing camera.

metric.name: IsMirrored
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the camera preview is mirrored when the capture happens.

metric.name: GridType
metric.summary: The applied grid setting when the capture happens.

metric.name: TimerType
metric.summary: The applied timer setting when the capture happens.

metric.name: ShutterType
metric.summary: The shutter type which triggers the camera capture.

metric.name: AndroidIntentResultType
metric.summary: The type of Android intent result which the capture leads to.

metric.name: IsWindowMaximized
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the window is maximized when the capture happens.

metric.name: IsWindowPortrait
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the window is in portrait orientation when the capture happens.

metric.name: ResolutionWidth
metric.summary: The width of the capture resolution.

metric.name: ResolutionHeight
metric.summary: The height of the capture resolution.

metric.name: ResolutionLevel
metric.summary: The level that the capture resolution falls within.

metric.name: AspectRatioSet
metric.summary: The aspect ratio set that the capture aspect ratio falls within.

metric.name: IsVideoSnapshot
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the photo is a snapshot taken during video recording.

metric.name: IsMuted
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the video is recorded with mic muted.

metric.name: Fps
metric.summary: The targeting frame rate of the video recording. 0 if the capture is not recording.

metric.name: EverPaused
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the user has ever paused the recording.

metric.name: Duration
metric.summary: The duration of the captured video in milliseconds.

metric.name: RecordType
metric.summary: The type of the video recording.

metric.name: GifResultType
metric.summary: The type of the GIF recording result.

metric.name: TimelapseSpeed
metric.summary: The acceleration speed that time-lapse feature applied. 0 if the capture is not time-lapse.

event.name: CameraApp.AndroidIntent
event.summary: Event recorded when the camera app is successfully handled an Android camera intent.

metric.name: Mode
metric.summary: The mode where the Android camera intent is corresponding to.

metric.name: ShouldHandleResult
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the camera app should handle the captured result for the Android camera intent.

metric.name: ShouldDownscale
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the camera app should downscale the captured result for the Android camera intent.

metric.name: IsSecure
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether the camera intent is launched under the secure mode.

event.name: CameraApp.OpenPTZPanel
event.summary: Event recorded when the PTZ panel is opened in the camera app.

metric.name: SupportPan
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether pan control is supported on the current camera.

metric.name: SupportTilt
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether tilt control is supported on the current camera.

metric.name: SupportZoom
metric.summary: Boolean indicating whether zoom control is supported on the current camera.

event.name: CameraApp.DocScanAction
event.summary: Event recorded when action related to document scanning is performed.

metric.name: ActionType
metric.summary: The type of the document scanning related action.

event.name: CameraApp.DocScanResult
event.summary: Event recorded when the user finishes a document scanning session.

metric.name: ResultType
metric.summary: The type of the result of this document scanning session.

metric.name: FixTypes
metric.summary: Integer used as a bit mask indicating the type(s) of fix that the user applied on the document scanning result.

metric.name: FixCount
metric.summary: Integer indicating how many times the user performed a fix on the document scanning result.

metric.name: PageCount
metric.summary: Integer indicating how many pages are there in the document scanning result.

event.name: CameraApp.OpenCamera
event.summary: Event recorded when the camera is opened in the camera app.

metric.name: CameraModuleId
metric.summary: String showing the camera module ID in "[VID]:[PID]" format if the camera module is in the top 20 list. Otherwise, it will be "others".

event.name: CameraApp.LowStorageAction
event.summary: Event recorded when a action is performed in the camera app due to low storage detection.

metric.name: ActionType
metric.summary: The type of the action for low storage handling.

event.name: CameraApp.BarcodeDetected
event.summary: Event recorded when a barcode is detected on the preview of the camera app.

metric.name: ContentType
metric.summary: The type of the content detected via the barcode.

metric.name: WifiSecurityType
metric.summary: The Wi-Fi security type brought in the Wi-Fi QR code. If the barcode content is not Wi-Fi, the type will be set to none.

event.name: CameraApp.Perf
event.summary: Event recorded when a performance measurement is done in the camera app.

metric.name: EventType
metric.summary: The type of the performance measurement.

metric.name: Duration
metric.summary: The duration of the performance event in milliseconds.

metric.name: Facing
metric.summary: The facing of the current camera. Will be unknown if the camera facing is irrelevant.

metric.name: ResolutionWidth
metric.summary: The resolution width of the camera. Will be 0 if the resolution information is not provided.

metric.name: ResolutionHeight
metric.summary: The resolution height of the camera. Will be 0 if the resolution information is not provided.

event.name: CameraApp.EndSession
event.summary: Event recorded when the camera app is closed.

metric.name: Duration
metric.summary: The duration of the camera app session in milliseconds.

metric.name: Behaviors
metric.summary: Bit mask indicating the combination of user behavior(s) that the user performed within the session.

metric.name: MemoryUsage
metric.summary: Integer indicating the maximum memory usage within the session in bytes.

event.name: OOBE.GaiaSigninRequested
event.summary: Recorded after the password is entered for authentication in the GAIA Sign- in screen. Note: this is not recorded for SAML flows.

metric.name: IsReauthentication
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the sign-in is for the online reauthintication an existing user.

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.name: IsOwnerUser
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is the owner of the device.

metric.name: IsEphemeralOrMGS
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is an ephemeral user or a managed guest session.

metric.name: IsFirstOnboarding
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the first onboarding flow and before entering the session for the first time (without crashing into session).

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.GaiaSigninCompleted
event.summary: Recorded after a successful authentication in the GAIA Sign-in screen. Note: this is not recorded for SAML flows.

metric.name: IsReauthentication
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the sign-in is for the online reauthintication an existing user.

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.name: IsOwnerUser
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is the owner of the device.

metric.name: IsEphemeralOrMGS
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is an ephemeral user or a managed guest session.

metric.name: IsFirstOnboarding
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the first onboarding flow and before entering the session for the first time (without crashing into session).

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.OobeStarted
event.summary: Recorded at the first start of OOBE before the first OOBE screen is shown.

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is in OOBE flow for ChromeOS Flex.

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.PreLoginOobeCompleted
event.summary: Recorded after the completion of the pre-login part of the flow.

metric.name: CompletedFlowType
metric.summary: Enum representing the type of completed pre-login OOBE flow. This enum should map to ash::OobeMetricsHelper::CompletedPreLoginOobeFlowType.

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.DeviceRegistered
event.summary: Recorded after the completion of the pre-login part of the flow.

metric.name: IsFirstOnboarding
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the first onboarding flow and before entering the session for the first time (without crashing into session).

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.OobeCompleted
event.summary: Recorded after the completion of the last screen in the onboarding flow and before the start of the session for the first user.

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.name: IsOwnerUser
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is the owner of the device.

metric.name: IsEphemeralOrMGS
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is an ephemeral user or a managed guest session.

metric.name: IsFirstOnboarding
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the first onboarding flow and before entering the session for the first time (without crashing into session).

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.OnboardingStarted
event.summary: Recorded after a new user logs-in and before the first onboarding screen is shown.

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.name: IsOwnerUser
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is the owner of the device.

metric.name: IsEphemeralOrMGS
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is an ephemeral user or a managed guest session.

metric.name: IsFirstOnboarding
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the first onboarding flow and before entering the session for the first time (without crashing into session).

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.OnboardingCompleted
event.summary: Recorded after the completion of the last screen in the onboarding flow and before the start of the session.

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.name: IsOwnerUser
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is the owner of the device.

metric.name: IsEphemeralOrMGS
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is an ephemeral user or a managed guest session.

metric.name: IsFirstOnboarding
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the first onboarding flow and before entering the session for the first time (without crashing into session).

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.PageEntered
event.summary: Recorded after a screen is shown to the user.

metric.name: PageId
metric.summary: The ID of the screen exited. PageId is the screen ID defined in the screen handlers. For example, the ID of the Welcome screen is "connect".

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.name: IsOwnerUser
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is the owner of the device.

metric.name: IsEphemeralOrMGS
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is an ephemeral user or a managed guest session.

metric.name: IsFirstOnboarding
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the first onboarding flow and before entering the session for the first time (without crashing into session).

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.PageSkippedBySystem
event.summary: Recorded after a screen was skipped by the system.

metric.name: PageId
metric.summary: The ID of the screen skipped.

metric.name: IsFlexFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: IsDemoModeFlow
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the demo mode setup flow.

metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported while the active user is an ephemeral user or a managed guest session.

metric.name: IsFirstOnboarding
metric.summary: Boolean for whether the event is reported during the first onboarding flow and before entering the session for the first time (without crashing into session).

metric.name: ChromeMilestone
metric.summary: The major version of chrome at the time of recording the event.

event.name: OOBE.PageLeft
event.summary: Recorded after a screen was exited.

metric.name: PageId
metric.summary: The ID of the screen exited.

metric.name: ExitReason
metric.summary: The ID of the reason for exiting the screen.

metric.summary: Boolean for whether the device is a ChromeOS Flex device.

metric.name: ChromeMilestone

event.name: UserLogin
event.summary: An event to signify a user is using the system.

event.name: UserLogout
event.summary: An event to signify a user explicitly logged out of the system.

event.name: SystemSuspended
event.summary: An event to signify the system has gone to sleep.

metric.name: Reason
metric.summary: The reason the system was suspended, maps to the SuspendImminent::Reason.

event.name: Test1
event.summary: Test event used for unit tests to ensure that the code-gen for the event sequence project is working properly.

metric.name: Metric1
metric.summary: Test metric1

event.name: NoMetricsEvent
event.summary: Test event for events without metrics.

project.name: DevTools
project.summary: Interaction metrics for the Chrome DevTools — debugging tools and capabilities offered by Chrome.

event.name: SessionStart
event.summary: Recorded whenever DevTools is opened

metric.name: Trigger
metric.summary: What caused DevTools to open (e.g. shortcut, inpsect menu item, etc)

metric.name: DockSide
metric.summary: Which side is devtools docked to

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.

event.name: SessionEnd
event.summary: Recorded whenever DevTools is closed

metric.name: Trigger
metric.summary: What caused DevTools to close (e.g. shortcut, close button, etc)

metric.name: TimeSinceSessionStart
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since DevTools sessions start.

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.

event.name: Impression
event.summary: Recorded whenever a new visual element is first shown to the user

metric.name: VeId
metric.summary: Visual Element ID

metric.name: VeType
metric.summary: Visual Element type.

metric.name: VeParent
metric.summary: ID of a parent of the visual element.

metric.name: VeContext
metric.summary: Arbitrary contextual information for the visual element.

metric.name: TimeSinceSessionStart
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since DevTools sessions start.

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.

metric.name: Width
metric.summary: Width of the element in pixels

metric.name: Height
metric.summary: Height of the element in pixels

event.name: Resize
event.summary: Recorded whenever a visual element significantly changes in size

metric.name: VeId
metric.summary: Visual Element ID

metric.name: TimeSinceSessionStart
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since DevTools sessions start.

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.

metric.name: Width
metric.summary: Width of the element in pixels

metric.name: Height
metric.summary: Height of the element in pixels

event.name: Click
event.summary: Recorded whenever user clicks on a tracked visual element.

metric.name: VeId
metric.summary: Visual Element ID

metric.name: MouseButton
metric.summary: An index of a mouse button as defined in JavaScript MouseEvent.

metric.name: Context
metric.summary: Arbitrary contextual information for the event.

metric.name: TimeSinceSessionStart
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since DevTools sessions start.

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.

event.name: Hover
event.summary: Recorded whenever user hovers on a tracked visual element.

metric.name: VeId
metric.summary: Visual Element ID

metric.name: Time
metric.summary: Number of seconds the hover has lasted

metric.name: Context
metric.summary: Arbitrary contextual information for the event.

metric.name: TimeSinceSessionStart
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since DevTools sessions start.

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.

event.name: Drag
event.summary: Recorded whenever user drags in a tracked visual element.

metric.name: VeId
metric.summary: Visual Element ID

metric.name: Distance
metric.summary: Number of pixels dragged

metric.name: Context
metric.summary: Arbitrary contextual information for the event.

metric.name: TimeSinceSessionStart
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since DevTools sessions start.

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.

event.name: Change
event.summary: Recorded whenever user changes a value of a tracked visual element.

metric.name: VeId
metric.summary: Visual Element ID

metric.name: Context
metric.summary: Arbitrary contextual information for the event.

metric.name: TimeSinceSessionStart
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since DevTools sessions start.

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.

event.name: KeyDown
event.summary: Recorded presses key on a tracked visual element.

metric.name: VeId
metric.summary: Visual Element ID

metric.name: Context
metric.summary: Arbitrary contextual information for the event.

metric.name: TimeSinceSessionStart
metric.summary: Time in milliseconds since DevTools sessions start.

metric.name: SessionId
metric.summary: Unique ID of this debugging session. If DevTools is opened on multiple tabs, each instance would have a unique ID.
